@Company_Name integer = NULL; @Department_Name integer = NULL;

INSERT INTO [Installments_Types] ([Name] ,[Description] ,[Max_Fixed] ,[Duration_Value_Months] ,[Specific_General] ,[Limit_Or_Not] ,[Version]) VALUES (@Name ,@Description ,@Max_Fixed ,@Duration_Value_Months ,@Specific_General ,@Limit_Or_Not ,@Version)

Insert into Installments (Name ,Description ,Emp_id ,Begin_Date ,Assign_Date ,Num_Months ,State ,Type ,Value) OUTPUT inserted.Id values (@Name ,@Description ,@Emp_id ,@Begin_Date ,@Assign_Date ,@Num_Months ,@State ,@Type ,@Value)
Insert into Installments_Months (Installments_ID , Emp_ID , Date , Month_Value) values (@Installments_ID ,@Emp_ID ,@Date ,@Month_Value)

select [Installments].[Id] , Employees.Name as 'EmpName', Employees.Actual_Salary, Jobs.Name as 'Job', Companies.Name as 'Company', Departments.Name as 'Department', [Installments].[Emp_id] , [Installments].[Name] , [Installments].[Description] , [Installments].[Type] , Installments_Types.Name as 'Type_Name' , [Installments].[State] , [Installments].[Value] , [Installments].[Num_Months] , [Installments].[Assign_Date] , [Installments].[Begin_Date] from [Installments] inner join Employees on Employees.Id = [Installments].[Emp_id] LEFT join Departments on Employees.Department_ID = Departments.Id LEFT join Companies on Employees.Company_ID_Emp = Companies.Id inner join Jobs on Employees.Job_ID = Jobs.Id inner join Installments_Types on Installments.Type = Installments_Types.Id
select [Installments_Months].[Id] as 'Installments_Months_ID', [Installments_Months].[Date] as 'Installments_Date', [Installments_Months].[Month_Value] as 'Installments_Month_Value' , Installments.Name as 'Installments_Name', Installments.Value as 'Installments_Value', Installments.Num_Months as 'Installments_Num_Months', Installments.Emp_id as 'Installments_Emp_id'
from Installments_Months inner join Installments on Installments.Id = Installments_Months.Installments_ID where convert(varchar(10),Installments_Months.Date,111) between @Begin_Date_from and @Begin_Date_to and Installments.Emp_id =@Emp_id
select [Installments_Months].[Id] , [Installments_Months].[Date] , [Installments_Months].[Month_Value]
from Installments_Months where [Installments_ID] = @Installments_ID
select [Installments_Months].[Id] , [Installments_Months].[Date] , [Installments_Months].[Emp_ID] , [Installments_Months].[Month_Value] , Employees.Name as 'Emp_Name', Employees.Actual_Salary, Departments.Name as 'Dept_Name', Companies.Name as 'Comp_Name', Jobs.Name as 'Jobs_Name',
Installments.Value, Installments.Num_Months, Installments.Type, Installments_Types.Name as 'Type_Name'
from Installments_Months
inner join Installments on Installments.Id = Installments_Months.Installments_ID inner join Employees on Employees.Id = [Installments_Months].[Emp_ID] Left join Departments on Departments.Id = Employees.Department_ID Left join Companies on Companies.Id = Employees.Company_ID_Emp Left join Jobs on Jobs.Id = Employees.Job_ID inner join Installments_Types on Installments.Type = Installments_Types.Id
where [Installments_Months].[Id] !=0 AND (@Begin_Date_from IS NULL OR ( convert(varchar(10),Installments_Months.Date,111) between @Begin_Date_from and @Begin_Date_to)) AND (@Emps IS NULL OR ( [Installments_Months].[Emp_ID] = @Emps )) AND (@Comps IS NULL OR ( Companies.Id= @Comps )) AND (@Depts IS NULL OR ( Departments.Id = @Depts )) order by Installments.Emp_id

select [Installments].[Id] , Employees.Name as 'EmpName', Employees.Actual_Salary, Jobs.Name as 'Job', Companies.Name as 'Company', Departments.Name as 'Department', [Installments].[Emp_id] , [Installments].[Name] , [Installments].[Description] , [Installments].[Type] , Installments_Types.Name as 'Type_Name' , [Installments].[State] , [Installments].[Value] , [Installments].[Num_Months] , [Installments].[Assign_Date] , [Installments].[Begin_Date] from [Installments] inner join Employees on Employees.Id = [Installments].[Emp_id] LEFT join Departments on Employees.Department_ID = Departments.Id LEFT join Companies on Employees.Company_ID_Emp = Companies.Id inner join Jobs on Employees.Job_ID = Jobs.Id inner join Installments_Types on Installments.Type = Installments_Types.Id where Departments.Id = @Department_Name

select [Installments].[Id] , Employees.Name as 'EmpName', Employees.Actual_Salary, Jobs.Name as 'Job', Companies.Name as 'Company', Departments.Name as 'Department', [Installments].[Emp_id] , [Installments].[Name] , [Installments].[Description] , [Installments].[Type] , Installments_Types.Name as 'Type_Name' , [Installments].[State] , [Installments].[Value] , [Installments].[Num_Months] , [Installments].[Assign_Date] , [Installments].[Begin_Date] from [Installments] inner join Employees on Employees.Id = [Installments].[Emp_id] LEFT join Departments on Employees.Department_ID = Departments.Id LEFT join Companies on Employees.Company_ID_Emp = Companies.Id inner join Jobs on Employees.Job_ID = Jobs.Id inner join Installments_Types on Installments.Type = Installments_Types.Id
where (@Emp_id IS NULL OR ( Installments.Emp_id = @Emp_ID ) ) AND (@Name IS NULL OR ( Installments.Name like '%'+@Name+'%' ) ) AND (@Type IS NULL OR ( Installments.Type = @Type ) ) AND (@State IS NULL OR ( Installments.State = @State ) ) AND (@Value IS NULL OR ( Installments.Value = @Value ) ) AND (@Num_Months IS NULL OR ( Installments.Num_Months = @Num_Months ) )
and(@Begin_Date_from IS NULL OR (convert(varchar(10),Begin_Date,111) between @Begin_Date_from and @Begin_Date_to))
AND (@Department_Name IS NULL OR ( Departments.Id = @Department_Name ) ) AND (@Company_Name IS NULL OR ( Companies.Id = @Company_Name ) )
Update Installments set State=@State where Id=@Id;
